a Thai Noodle Bar — a couple of small improvements worth noting
email_body:
I came across a Thai Noodle Bar while looking at restaurants in Westport and wanted to get in touch.

Your site is well put together — strong mobile performance, clear layout, and a booking system already in place. The main thing worth keeping an eye on is ongoing WordPress maintenance, as sites with a strong setup like yours benefit from regular updates to stay performing at that level.

There are also a couple of small additions — local schema markup and confirming your Google Reviews are dynamically embedded — that are low effort and would strengthen how the site appears in local search.

I offer a monthly WordPress care plan that covers routine maintenance and picks up improvements like these as part of the service. Happy to set up a light review call if that sounds like something worth a conversation.

Best regards
[Your name]
